department.en: Department of Space Science and Engineering

goal.en: "Understanding the solar plasma and magnetic structures, as well as the particle acceleration and energy transport processes in the heliosphere. Analyzing the solar eruptive and energetic particle events."
goal.ch: 使學生認識太陽圈構造，了解太陽及行星際空間中的電漿與磁場結構，及粒子加速與能量傳輸過程，並將所學應用於實際觀測事件的分析

content.en:
"Solar eruptions and radiation
Heliosphere
Large-scale structures in the interplanetary space
Energetic particles
Particle acceleration
Energy transport"
content.ch:
"太陽爆發及輻射
太陽圈/日球層
行星際空間中之大尺度結構
高能粒子
粒子加速
能量轉換"
